Article Name: Why Retail Media Networks Hide Their Tech Stacks From The Very Brands They Want To Attract
Description: Retail media networks hide their tech stacks, frustrating advertisers and stalling DSP integrations. Why secrecy hurts growth—and how transparency wins budgets.

Article Name: Brain Rot Marketing, Gamification And Crowdsourcing: Three Lessons From The Labubu Fad
Description: What Labubu's popularity tells us about the intersection between brain rot marketing, gamification and crowdsourcing

Article Name: Digital Transformation At Sea: Carnival's DXC Technology Alliance
Description: Carnival Cruise Line's strategic partnership with DXC Technology demonstrates how enterprise IT modernization drives competitive advantage for large enterprise.

Article Name: What AI Can And Can’t Replace In Executive Coaching
Description: Discover how AI is transforming executive and business coaching. Learn what it does better, where it falls short, and how human coaches can stay valuable in the market.

Article Name: Can Agentic AI Bring The Pope Or The Queen Back To Life — And Rewrite History?
Description: Elon Musk’s AI claims and Google’s launch of the Veo3 video model signal a shift toward agentic AI—systems that could digitally recreate figures like the Pope or Queen Elizabeth II to interact with the present. While these tools offer powerful new possibilities, they also raise serious concerns about misinformation and the ethical need to regulate how history is represented.

Article Name: Autonomous Vehicles Are Rolling Out—Here’s How Cities Can Lead
Description: Autonomous vehicles are arriving fast. Here's how cities can prepare—by rethinking curbs, sharing data, and shaping AV deployment to meet climate and mobility goals.

Article Name: IBM Promises Enterprise-Ready Quantum Computing By 2029
Description: IBM announced plans for its IBM Quantum Starling, a fault-tolerant quantum computer  that will be ready in 2029.

Article Name: AI Agents Are Coming To Healthcare
Description: AI agents are entering healthcare not just as tools, but as digital workers. Here, I explore the jobs they’re taking on—and what it will take to unlock their potential.

Article Name: Nutanix And Pure Storage Team Up To Answer VMware Uncertainty
Description: Nutanix and Pure Storage partner to offer an integrated solution for virtualization as VMware customers seek alternatives under Broadcom ownership.

Article Name: Atlassian’s Strategic Pivot From Dev Tools To Enterprise Powerhouse
Description: Atlassian is evolving from point solutions to an integrated enterprise platform, positioning it as a direct challenger to enterprise software giants.
